text:
Nova | nova.com | Web Developer | Stockholm, Sweden | Full-time, on-site

Nova is a talent network, which is transforming into a product organisation. We’re building web and mobile apps that facilitate personal and professional development, and help top talents connect and collaborate with each other across the globe.

We’re a small team, with a laser focus on delivering value to our users by building simple and scalable solutions.

For more information and to apply: https://emp.jobylon.com/jobs/3443-nova-frontend-developer/
